ComicInfo.Summary: Under great stress, Dragon encounters the Shrew, whom he defeats in a vicious battle. He fights Barbaric and Ricochet, but later befriends them. The Vicious Circle, knowing Frank Darling arranged an attack on his cousin to make Dragon join the force, blackmail Darling into protecting them.
